Title Heading: Tool/Runtime to Assemble declaratively from Language/Framework/Platform neutral abstractions defined in files
Title: Can we Assemble <strike>App</strike>Web's?
SubTitle: App<strike>Web</strike> Offline Viewer for Html Data Component
Description: App<strike>Web</strike> Viewer is a Tool for Assembling/Viewing of Html Data Components

Info1 SubTitle: Ensure index.html exists in appsites folder of the Index AppSite
